name: Pony Seasons - Extra Adventure Labyrinth Game - Free Edition
name_original: Pony Seasons - Extra Adventure Labyrinth Game - Free Edition
description:
Collect muffins, bring the letter. Make your pink pony cheerful!

Eeyup! A 20% cooler hoof-made game!
Come on every-pony, bronies and pega-sisters, help the mail-mare pony!
You have to deliver a present, a carrot and a letter! Yay!
Avoid the changeling army!

What you get:
> Charming joyful pixel graphics
> 3 worlds
> More than 39 levels to beat!
> Real heart's warming and hearts and hooves mood
> NO INAPP-s, child safe!
